channel.title: TWIAR International
channel.description: TWIAR International: North America's Amateur Radio News Magazine - Heard on WBCQ Shortwave - Podcast feeds expire after one week. Archives after one week available at http://archive.twiar.org

item.title: TWIAR International #314 - Week of 1/30/11
item.description: This Week in Amateur Radio International (TWIARi) Edition #314 for the week beginning 1/30/11 has been released. The program is now available at our web site at www.twiar.org for direct download, or via podcast-RSS subscription

item.title: TWIAR International #311 - Week of 1/9/11 - corrected
item.description: This Week in Amateur Radio International (TWIARi) Edition #311 for the week beginning 1/9/11 has been released. The program is now available at our web site at www.twiar.org for direct download, or via podcast-RSS subscription
